page.title: 03Safari Park, Kidderminster
page.content: In our area we have the West Midlands Safari Park. You can either go in a car to see the animals or just walk around and have a go on the rides. The animals can roam around freely in their part of the Safari Park, except for the lions, who have a wire fence around them. In the Park there are monkeys, lions, elephants, rhinoceros, giraffes, tigers, hippos and horses. With some of the less dangerous animals you can open your car windows but with monkeys in particular they must remain shut because they can be very vicious. Another part of the Park has a fairground, eating facilities and a pets corner. During the afternoon there are sea lions shows.
